field.-embed: Create a embed from a json
field.-help: Display this, second arg = help to an element (without `-`)
field.-admin: Display the name of the admin
field.-usrlist: Create a List from all users at the server
field.-whois: Show Information about the mentioned user
field.-play: Play a youtube music in Voice channel (Type `-help play` for more about this module)

admin.desc: Display the name of the admin

usrlist.desc: Create a List from all users at the server

whois.desc: Show Information about the Mentioned user

play.desc: Play a youtube music in the Voice channel you joined (join a voice channel first!) | :shark:
